Title: Establishes environmental standards for ambient lead and lead contamination
Summary: Establishes environmental standards for ambient lead and lead contamination in soils and on floors and window sills.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-0301, En Con L; amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the public health law, in relation to establishing environmental standards for ambient lead and lead contamination in soils and on floors and window sills
